hints.title: Revival Rate Constraint
hints.content:
521: :label: obs-revival-rate-constraint
522: 
523: In the two-state model, KL-non-expansiveness requires $\lambda_{\text{revive}} \le 1$.
524: 
525: **Physical interpretation**: Revival rate must not exceed the death rate (on average) for stability.
hints.raw_directive:
518: **Conclusion**: If $\lambda \le 1$, contraction holds. If $\lambda > 1$, expansion!
